sources.title: "Tales of Tomorrow" Blunder
sources.description: Title: "Tales of Tomorrow" Blunder Summary: Scientists race to warn a colleague that his experiment could destroy life on Earth. Directed by: Leonard Valenta Actors: Robert Allen, Ann Loring, Philip Faversham Production Company: Dick Gorden Productions Release Date: Episode aired 10 August 1951 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A scientist working on a new kind of nuclear reactor in the Arctic has made a mistake in his calculations that could have fatal consequences for life on Earth. Two other scientists must try to contact him before he can start his experiment.
